author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Afrocentric Expects HY ‍Diluted HEPS Between 21.24 Cents And 22.10 Cents​
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Afrocentric Investment Corp Ltd:
* EXPECTS HY ‍DILUTED HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE BETWEEN 21.24 CENTS AND 22.10 CENTS​
* ‍EXPECTS HY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE BETWEEN 21.18 CENTS AND 22.05 CENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
